content: Turn the volume up sit back hear, see and become part of something that is beautiful. *http://www.videogully.com/ILSILENZIOA-RIEU__FCX9UY143xI.html If your heart is not touched, I can give you the appointment phone number at the heart institute - because your heart needs to be examined. You tell me, am I right or wrong/ God and the soldier, All men adore, In time of trouble, And no more; For when war is over, And all things righted, God is neglected - The old soldier slighted. Founding Member Original DVG & Proud Member, Rupterd Duck/Derelict Veterans

title: This will touch your heart.

content: The lady is wonderfully gifted, we saw her on the telly the other night. When she came on stage, the camera showed peoples reaction to her appearance. When she began singing, their esxpressions changed. They were in awe of her beautiful voice and her ability! Just goes to show, "Don't judge a book by it's cover" in the past I have been guilty of that myself! I think she is going to go a long way, and she desreves it! Keep smiling, everyone will wonder what you've been up to!
